channel.title: How to change price in shop ? Project Insanity Source
channel.description:
Source is Project Insanity.
First off, DONT SAY IT'S IN THE ITEM.CFG because it is NOT.
I am using MTP V2 source and client and I cannot figure it out, I am trying to edit the price of barrows. Can someone please help me.
The source I am using - http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,457959.0.html

item.title: How to change price in shop ? Project Insanity Source
item.dc:creator: @Football1smylife Football1smylife
item.description:
@Football1smylife wrote:

I said it’s not in item.cfg god dammit.

Read full topic

item.title: How to change price in shop ? Project Insanity Source
item.dc:creator: @dragonman2 dragonman2
item.description:
@dragonman2 wrote:

You have to change it all i think theres a list like this

00000 0000000000000 000000000 0000000000 and what ever. Just change it to the Price u want. IN ALL OF THEM!

item.title: How to change price in shop ? Project Insanity Source
item.dc:creator: @Sanskrit Sanskrit
item.description:
@Sanskrit wrote:

data/cfg/prices. then search for the item id within the file and change its price.

Read full topic
